text: Feels like #COVID19 is getting upper hand if today's news is anything to go by.  US, UK, Iran pass grim milestones, severe allergic reactions to #Pfizer #vaccine reported, and confusion over #influenza cases being reported as Covid. @CDCMMWR @FirstSquawk @DHSCgovuk @talkRADIO 🤔 https://t.co/2zx2oVZtRX
